content: Impressive night view of Bengaluru's Silk Board! The metro's Blue Line from here to KR Puram is on track for Dec 2026 completion, easing that traffic. Great progress for the city.

Americans don’t keep talking about nuclear bombing Japan in a conversation about iPhone & ChatGPT. Indians are a unique species where during the celebration for Mangalyaan, we have to compulsorily talk about potholes and silk board traffic.
Wait till you hit silk board traffic mate

Traffic Status on ORR:
KR Puram Metro Station-->Silk Board Junction: 34mins. 3% more than normal.
Silk Board Junction-->KR Puram Metro Station: 52mins. 52% more than normal.
